info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Polk, northeastern Greenville and northwestern Spartanburg Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Columbus, or 5 miles southwest of Tryon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Landrum, Tryon, Campobello, Saluda, Lake Bowen, Gowensville, North Saluda Reservoir and Glassy Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
